pokemons.name: Venusaur
pokemons.evolution: Venusaur evolves from Ivysaur at level 32. It can mega evolve into Mega Venusaur using the Venusaurite.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.evolution: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon starting at level 36. It is the final form of Charmander.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.evolution: Blastoise evolves from Wartortle starting at level 36. Blastoise can further evolve into Mega Blastoise using the Blastoisinite.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.evolution: Butterfree evolves from Metapod at level 10 and is the final evolution of Caterpie.

pokemons.name: Beedrill
pokemons.evolution: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and evolves from Kakuna at level 10. Beedrill gains a Mega Evolution in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

pokemons.name: Fearow
pokemons.evolution: Fearow evolves from Spearow at level 20.

pokemons.name: Nidoqueen
pokemons.evolution: Nidoqueen is the evolved form of a Nidorina by use of a Moon Stone, and is the final form of a Nidoran.

pokemons.name: Venomoth
pokemons.evolution: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat as of level 31.

pokemons.name: Wigglytuff
pokemons.evolution: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff by the use of a Moon Stone. Wigglytuff is the final form of Igglybuff.

pokemons.name: Jynx
pokemons.evolution: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30.
